Package de.oth.blocklib.entities

Class Camera

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.entities.Camera
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
DebugCamera
public class Camera
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Represents the state of the camera. Has a position, pitch, yaw and roll value.
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • Camera

      public Camera()
      Constructor of Camera. Used to calculate the viewport in the shaders. Has a position, pitch, yaw and roll value

  • Method Details

    • createViewMatrix

      public org.lwjgl.util.vector.Matrix4f createViewMatrix()
      Create view matrix with the position, pitch and yaw of this camera.
      Returns:
      A ViewMatrix calculated for the given camera.

    • updateProjectionMatrix

      public void updateProjectionMatrix()
      Creates a projectionMatrix

    • getProjectionMatrix

      public org.lwjgl.util.vector.Matrix4f getProjectionMatrix()

    • move

      public void move​(float dx, float dy, float dz, float pitch, float yaw, float roll)
      To change the angles of the "camera".
      Parameters:
      dx - horizontal axis
      dy - vertical axis
      dz - far / near axis
      pitch - turns camera up / down
      yaw - turns camera left / right
      roll - rolls the camera

    • walkForward

      public void walkForward​(float distance)
      moves the camera forward relative to its current rotation (yaw)
      Parameters:
      distance - to move

    • strafeRight

      public void strafeRight​(float distance)
      strafes the camera right relative to its current rotation (yaw)
      Parameters:
      distance - to move

    • getForwardVector

      public org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f getForwardVector()

    • getPosition

      public org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f getPosition()
      Current position of the camera
      Returns:
      Vector with three floats

    • setPosition

      public void setPosition​(org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f vector3f)
      Change the position of the camera.
      Parameters:
      vector3f - a new position.

    • getPitch

      public float getPitch()
      Up / right of the camera
      Returns:
      how much the camera is turned up or down

    • setPitch

      public void setPitch​(float pitch)
      Sets the value of pitch to a fixed value
      Parameters:
      pitch - the cameras new roll pitch

    • getYaw

      public float getYaw()
      Left / right of the camera
      Returns:
      how much the camera is turned left or right (in degrees AND the value does not reset at 360 but keeps going up)

    • setYaw

      public void setYaw​(float yaw)
      Sets the value of yaw to a fixed value
      Parameters:
      yaw - the cameras new yaw value

    • getRoll

      public float getRoll()
      Roll of the camera (not useful in minecraft like game?)
      Returns:
      the roll of the camera

    • setRoll

      public void setRoll​(float roll)
      Sets the value of roll to a fixed value
      Parameters:
      roll - the cameras new roll value
